document_api_meta.title: Search Cancellations
document_api_meta.env_desc: Use this API to search and retrieve one or more order cancellations.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: sort_field
request_query_param.desc:
The returned results will be sorted by the specified field. 
Default: create_time
Possible values:
- create_time
- update_time

Specify the order for sorting the returned results by using the sort_order parameter.

request_query_param.name: sort_order
request_query_param.desc:
The sort order for the sort_field parameter. 
Default: ASC
Possible values:
- ASC: Ascending order
- DESC: Descending order

request_query_param.name: page_size
request_query_param.desc:
The number of results to be returned per page. 
Default: 10. 
Valid range: [1-50].

request_query_param.name: page_token
request_query_param.desc: An opaque token used to retrieve the next page of a paginated result set. Retrieve this value from the result of the next_page_token from a previous response. It is not needed for the first page.

request_query_param.name: shop_cipher
request_query_param.desc:
Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. 
Get by API [Get Authorization Shop](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9?external_id=6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9)

request_body_param.name: order_ids
request_body_param.desc: List of TikTok Shop order IDs.

request_body_param.name: buyer_user_ids
request_body_param.desc: List of TikTok Shop buyer user IDs.

request_body_param.name: cancel_types
request_body_param.desc:
List of order cancellation types.
Possible values:
- CANCEL: Cancel by seller or system.
- BUYER_CANCEL: Cancel by buyer. Need to be approved by seller or system.

request_body_param.name: cancel_status
request_body_param.desc:
List of order cancellation statuses.
Possible values:
- CANCELLATION_REQUEST_PENDING
- CANCELLATION_REQUEST_SUCCESS
- CANCELLATION_REQUEST_CANCEL
- CANCELLATION_REQUEST_COMPLETE

Please see "API Overview" for more information about these statuses.

request_body_param.name: create_time_ge
request_body_param.desc: Filter cancellations to show only orders that have been created after a specified date and time. Unix timestamp.

request_body_param.name: create_time_lt
request_body_param.desc: Filter cancellations to show only orders that have been created before a specified date and time. Unix timestamp.

request_body_param.name: update_time_ge
request_body_param.desc: Filter cancellations to show only orders that have been updated after a specified date and time. Unix timestamp.

request_body_param.name: update_time_lt
request_body_param.desc: Filter cancellations to show only orders that have been updated before a specified date and time. Unix timestamp.

request_body_param.name: locale
request_body_param.desc:
The BCP-47 locale codes for displaying the order, delimited by commas. Default: en-US
Refer to [Locale codes](678e3a47bae28f030a8c7523) for the list of supported locale codes.

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: request_id
response_param.desc: Request log

response_param.name: data
response_param.desc: Specific return information

response_param.name: ^cancellations
response_param.desc: List of order cancellations.

response_param.name: ^^order_id
response_param.desc: TikTok Shop order ID. Contains multiple order line item IDs.

response_param.name: ^^cancel_type
response_param.desc:
Order cancellation type.
Possible values:
- CANCEL: Cancel by seller or system.
- BUYER_CANCEL: Cancel by buyer. Need to be approved by seller or system.

response_param.name: ^^cancel_status
response_param.desc:
Order cancellation status.
Possible values:
- CANCELLATION_REQUEST_PENDING
- CANCELLATION_REQUEST_SUCCESS
- CANCELLATION_REQUEST_CANCELLED
- CANCELLATION_REQUEST_COMPLETE

response_param.name: ^^role
response_param.desc:
Order cancellation initiator.
Possible values:
- BUYER
- SELLER
- SYSTEM

response_param.name: ^^cancel_reason
response_param.desc: Order cancellation reason.

response_param.name: ^^cancel_reason_text
response_param.desc:
Order cancellation reason, localized to another language.
You can change language using the locale field in the request parameter.

response_param.name: ^^create_time
response_param.desc: Order cancellation create time. Unix timestamp.

response_param.name: ^^update_time
response_param.desc: Order cancellation update time. Unix timestamp.

response_param.name: ^^seller_next_action_response
response_param.desc: Seller's next action and deadline.

response_param.name: ^^^action
response_param.desc:
Seller's next action.
Possible values:
- SELLER_RESPOND_CANCEL

response_param.name: ^^^deadline
response_param.desc: Unix timestamp indicating the deadline for when the seller must perform the next action.

response_param.name: ^^refund_amount
response_param.desc: Refund amount information.

response_param.name: ^^^currency
response_param.desc: Refund currency.

response_param.name: ^^^refund_total
response_param.desc: Total refund amount to the buyer.

response_param.name: ^^^refund_subtotal
response_param.desc: Subtotal refund amount to the buyer.

response_param.name: ^^^refund_shipping_fee
response_param.desc: Shipping fee refund amount to the buyer.

response_param.name: ^^^refund_tax
response_param.desc: Tax refund amount to the buyer.

response_param.name: ^^^retail_delivery_fee
response_param.desc: Retail delivery fee takes effect once platform GMV exceeds $500,000 USD, according to Colorado (US) compliance rules.

response_param.name: ^^^buyer_service_fee
response_param.desc: Only for the ID market. Platform will charge the buyer a service fee depending on the scenario.

response_param.name: ^^cancel_line_items
response_param.desc: Cancellation line items.

response_param.name: ^^^cancel_line_item_id
response_param.desc: Cancellation line item ID.

response_param.name: ^^^order_line_item_id
response_param.desc: Order line item ID.

response_param.name: ^^^sku_id
response_param.desc: SKU ID.

response_param.name: ^^^sku_name
response_param.desc: SKU name.

response_param.name: ^^^product_image
response_param.desc: Product image object. Contains product image information.

response_param.name: ^^^^url
response_param.desc: Product image URL.

response_param.name: ^^^^width
response_param.desc:
Product image width.
Unit: px

response_param.name: ^^^^height
response_param.desc:
Product image height.
Unit: px

response_param.name: ^^^product_name
response_param.example: bundle No Heel Flat Heel Summer Winter Round Toe
response_param.desc: Product name.

response_param.name: ^^^seller_sku
response_param.desc: SKU name defined by the seller.

response_param.name: ^^^refund_amount
response_param.desc: Refund amount information.

response_param.name: ^^^^currency
response_param.desc: Refund currency.

response_param.name: ^^^^refund_total
response_param.desc: Total refund amount to the buyer.

response_param.name: ^^^^refund_subtotal
response_param.desc: Subtotal refund amount to the buyer.

response_param.name: ^^^^refund_shipping_fee
response_param.desc: Shipping fee refund amount to the buyer.

response_param.name: ^^^^refund_tax
response_param.desc: Tax refund amount to the buyer.

response_param.name: ^^^^retail_delivery_fee
response_param.desc: Retail delivery fee takes effect once platform GMV exceeds 500,000 USD, according to Colorado (US) compliance rules.

response_param.name: ^^^^buyer_service_fee
response_param.desc: Only for the ID market. Platform will charge the buyer service fee depending on the scenario.

response_param.name: ^^cancel_id
response_param.desc: The identifier of a specific order cancellation.

response_param.name: ^total_count
response_param.desc: The number of cancellations that meet the query conditions.

response_param.name: ^next_page_token
response_param.desc: An opaque token used to retrieve the next page of a paginated result set. Provide this value in the page_token parameter of your request if the current response does not return all the results.

error_code_list.msg: An invalid request parameter was passed. Please check that you have the correct parameter type(s) and format.
No permission to process this order
Internal error. Please try again. If the issue persists after multiple attempts, please contact platform support.
